message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how the negotiations go from here!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for starting the negotiations!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think I deserve more for being a good negotiator!
I'm not budging on the majority share, you can either accept or we'll keep negotiating!
I'm willing to give you a large share, but I think I deserve a bit more than 25% of the original amount!
I'm not giving up, I think I deserve the majority of the money, and I'm willing to take a small risk to get it!
I'm willing to give you a large share, but I think I deserve a bit more than 18% of the original amount!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still not willing to give up the majority of the money. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to give you a significant share, but I think I deserve a bit more than 12% of the original amount!
I'm taking a huge risk, but I'm willing to give you a tiny share if I can get the majority of the money. This is my final offer!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, take this or we'll both go home with nothing!
I'm going all-in, I'll give you a tiny fraction of the money if I can get the majority. This is my last, last offer!
